verses.text: These also are sayings of the wise: To show partiality in judging is not good:
Whoever says to the guilty, "You are innocent"- peoples will curse him and nations denounce him.
But it will go well with those who convict the guilty, and rich blessing will come upon them.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 24:23–25
rsbNotes.text: 24:23–25 Justice is essential. A well-ordered society is one in which justice is done and is seen to be done. This complements the directive given in vv. 21, 22.
